content: Yes, Kafka's dedication and talent are incredible, considering the challenges he faced in his personal life. His unfinished works, such as "The Castle" and "Amerika," leave us to wonder what other masterpieces he could have produced if he had better health and more time to write. Nonetheless, his existing works have left a profound impact on the literary world, and his influence continues to be felt across various genres and mediums. It's fascinating to ponder on what Kafka's legacy might have been like if his life circumstances were different.
